alert.note: Alert for Clark; Scotland (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 25 at 3:21AM CST until November 26 at 10:00AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to three inches. * WHERE...Portions of east central and southeast Iowa and northeast Missouri. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The first accumulating snow event of the season can often cause travel problems as people adjust to the poor driving conditions. Allow extra travel time and use caution.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
